title: Positive Affect Expansion Strategies to Enhance Teachers' Instructional Design Imagination

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational pedagogy concepts and teaching methodology comprehension
context.additional_context: Focuses on practical approaches to strengthen instructional design competencies and positive emotional management strategies for pre-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more concrete strategies that apply positive emotion expansion theory to stimulate instructional design imagination
Learners can generate at least five creative ideas applicable to instructional contexts while reflecting on everyday experiences
Learners can develop effective educational scenarios through the interaction of resilience and behavioral inspiration in the instructional design process
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
